## Course textbook

## Course topics

* Unit 1: Answering questions with quantitative methods
    * [Lecture 1](https://c-voulgaris.github.io/SES-5215-F22/unit-1/lecture-1.html){target="_blank"}
* Unit 2: Visualizing data
* Unit 3: Hypothesis testing
* Unit 4: Regression models
* Unit 5: Multiple regression

## Assignments

* Assignment 1: Select a dataset
* Assignment 2: Visualize data
* Assignment 3: Test hypotheses
* Assignment 4: Duplicate hypothesis tests with regression
* Assignment 5: Estimate a multiple regression model

## Final project

For your final project, you will prepare a report with the 
following sections:

* Introduction: Present your research question, why it matters, and summarize
the answer.
* Data: Describe your data set.
* Methods: Explain the methods you use to analyze your data.
* Results: Present your results.
* Discussion: Explain what your results mean (and what they cannot
be interpretted to mean).
* Conclusion: Summarize your research question and its answer, and discuss
potential next steps.
